Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards and deliver exceptional value. This product is worth more than $120 to me, and I believe it holds significant potential value for you as well. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you today. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product for $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique value it brings to its users. I trust that you will find its features and performance to be well worth the investment. If you're interested in securing this deal, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
